verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year שָׁל֗וֹשׁ <WH7969> sha-Loosh, In the third לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <WH3566> le-Cho-resh of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> pa-Ras, of Persia דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> da-Var a thing נִגְלָ֣ה <WH1540> nig-Lah was revealed לְדָֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> le-da-ni-Yel, unto Daniel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> nik-Ra was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֑ר <WH1095> be-le-te-shatz-Tzar; Belteshazzar וֶאֱמֶ֤ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met [was] true הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> had-da-Var and the thing וְצָבָ֣א <WH6635> ve-tza-Va but the time appointed גָד֔וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, [was] long וּבִין֙ <WH995> u-Vin and he understood אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> had-da-Var, the thing וּבִ֥ינָה <WH998> u-Vi-nah and had understanding ל֖וֹ <WH99999> lo בַּמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> bam-mar-'Eh. of the vision

בַּיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim In those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> ha-Hem; those אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I דָֽנִיֵּאל֙ <WH1840> da-ni-yeL I Daniel הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti had been מִתְאַבֵּ֔ל <WH56> mit-'ab-Bel, was mourning שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <WH7620> sha-vu-'Im weeks יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. full

לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread חֲמֻד֞וֹת <WH2530> cha-mu-Dot beauty לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor אָכַ֗לְתִּי <WH398> 'a-Chal-ti, I ate וּבָשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> u-va-Sar flesh וָיַ֛יִן <WH3196> va-Ya-yin nor wine לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor בָ֥א <WH935> va neither came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about פִּ֖י <WH6310> pi in my mouth וְס֣וֹךְ <WH5480> ve-Soch neither did I anoint לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor סָ֑כְתִּי <WH5480> Sa-che-ti; myself at all עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until מְלֹ֕את <WH4390> me-Lot were fulfilled שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet till three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <WH7620> sha-vu-'Im weeks יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. whole פ Peh

וּבְי֛וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom day עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah And in the four לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon; of the first וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, I הָיִ֛יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti become עַ֣ל <WH5921> 'al was by יַ֧ד <WH3027> yad as I was by the side הַנָּהָ֛ר <WH5104> han-na-Har river הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol of the great ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu that חִדָּֽקֶל׃ <WH2313> chid-Da-kel. which [is] Hiddekel

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> va-'es-Sa Then I lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָאֵ֔רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re, and looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and behold a certain לָב֣וּשׁ <WH3847> la-Vush clothed בַּדִּ֑ים <WH906> bad-Dim; in linen וּמָתְנָ֥יו <WH4975> u-ma-te-Nav whose loins חֲגֻרִ֖ים <WH2296> cha-gu-Rim [were] girded בְּכֶ֥תֶם <WH3800> be-Che-tem with fine gold אוּפָֽז׃ <WH210> 'u-Faz. of Uphaz

וּגְוִיָּת֣וֹ <WH1472> u-ge-vi-ya-To His body כְתַרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <WH8658> che-tar-Shish, also [was] like the beryl וּפָנָ֞יו <WH6440> u-fa-Nav and his face כְּמַרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> ke-mar-'Eh as the appearance בָרָק֙ <WH1300> va-Rak of lightning וְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> ve-'ei-Nav and his eyes כְּלַפִּ֣ידֵי <WH3940> ke-lap-Pi-dei as lamps אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, of fire וּזְרֹֽעֹתָיו֙ <WH2220> u-ze-ro-'o-Tav and his arms וּמַרְגְּלֹתָ֔יו <WH4772> u-mar-ge-lo-Tav, and his feet כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> ke-'Ein like in colour נְחֹ֣שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet brass קָלָ֑ל <WH7044> ka-Lal; to polished וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice דְּבָרָ֖יו <WH1697> de-va-Rav of his words כְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> ke-Kol like the voice הָמֽוֹן׃ <WH1995> ha-Mon. of a multitude

וְרָאִיתִי֩ <WH7200> ve-ra-'i-Ti alone saw אֲנִ֨י <WH589> 'a-Ni I דָנִיֵּ֤אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel And I Daniel לְבַדִּי֙ <WH905> le-vad-Di alone אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּרְאָ֔ה <WH4759> ham-mar-'Ah, the vision וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim for the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> 'im-Mi, with לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not רָא֖וּ <WH7200> ra-'U that were with me saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּרְאָ֑ה <WH4759> ham-mar-'Ah; not the vision אֲבָ֗ל <WH61> 'a-Val, but חֲרָדָ֤ה <WH2731> cha-ra-Dah quaking גְדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> ge-do-Lah a great נָפְלָ֣ה <WH5307> na-fe-Lah fell עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, on וַֽיִּבְרְח֖וּ <WH1272> vai-yiv-re-Chu upon them so that they fled בְּהֵחָבֵֽא׃ <WH2244> be-he-cha-Ve. to hide

וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <WH7604> nish-'Ar-ti Therefore I was left alone לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> le-vad-Di, alone וָֽאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh, and saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּרְאָ֤ה <WH4759> ham-mar-'Ah vision הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah this great הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, yet וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo no נִשְׁאַר־ <WH7604> nish-'ar- and there remained בִּ֖י bi כֹּ֑ח <WH3581> Koch; no strength וְהוֹדִ֗י <WH1935> ve-ho-Di, in me for my comeliness נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <WH2015> neh-Pach was turned עָלַי֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lai unto לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH4889> le-mash-Chit, in me into corruption וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <WH6113> 'a-Tzar-ti and I retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> Ko-ach. no strength

וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> va-'esh-Ma' Yet heard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol I the voice דְּבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> de-va-Rav; of his words וּכְשָׁמְעִי֙ <WH8085> u-che-sha-me-'I and when I heard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice דְּבָרָ֔יו <WH1697> de-va-Rav, of his words וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, I הָיִ֛יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti become נִרְדָּ֥ם <WH7290> nir-Dam then was I in a deep sleep עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> pa-Nai on my face וּפָנַ֥י <WH6440> u-fa-Nai and my face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> 'A-re-tzah. toward the ground

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- behold יָ֖ד <WH3027> yad And behold an hand נָ֣גְעָה <WH5060> Na-ge-'ah touched בִּ֑י Bi; וַתְּנִיעֵ֥נִי <WH5128> vat-te-ni-'E-ni me which set עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and בִּרְכַּ֖י <WH1290> bir-Kai me upon my knees וְכַפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> ve-chap-Pot and [upon] the palms יָדָֽי׃ <WH3027> ya-Dai. of my hands

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֡י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel unto me O Daniel אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- a man חֲ֠מֻדוֹת <WH2530> Cha-mu-dot beauty הָבֵ֨ן <WH995> ha-Ven understand בַּדְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> bad-de-va-Rim the words אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher that אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I am דֹבֵ֤ר <WH1696> do-Ver that I speak אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about וַעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> va-'a-Mod unto thee and stand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto עָמְדֶ֔ךָ <WH5975> 'a-me-De-cha, unto me I stood כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah have now שֻׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> shul-Lach-ti for unto thee am I now sent אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha; to you וּבְדַבְּר֥וֹ <WH1696> u-ve-dab-be-Ro And when he had spoken עִמִּ֛י <WH5973> 'im-Mi with אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> had-da-Var this word הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this עָמַ֥דְתִּי <WH5975> 'a-Mad-ti and stand מַרְעִֽיד׃ <WH7460> mar-'Id. trembling

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַי֮ <WH413> 'e-Lai about אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> ti-Ra he unto me Fear דָנִיֵּאל֒ <WH1840> da-ni-yeL not Daniel כִּ֣י׀ <WH3588> ki for מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom day הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon, for from the first אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you נָתַ֧תָּ <WH5414> na-Ta-ta that thou didst set אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- לִבְּךָ֛ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha thine heart לְהָבִ֧ין <WH995> le-ha-Vin to understand וּלְהִתְעַנּ֛וֹת <WH6031> u-le-hit-'an-Not and to chasten לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei thyself before אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> nish-me-'U were heard דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1697> de-va-Rei-cha; thy words וַאֲנִי־ <WH589> va-'a-ni- and I בָ֖אתִי <WH935> Va-ti and I am come בִּדְבָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1697> bid-va-Rei-cha. for thy words

וְשַׂ֣ר׀ <WH8269> ve-Sar But the prince מַלְכ֣וּת <WH4438> mal-Chut of the kingdom פָּרַ֗ס <WH6539> pa-Ras, of Persia עֹמֵ֤ד <WH5975> 'o-Med withstood לְנֶגְדִּי֙ <WH5048> le-neg-Di about עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim and twenty וְאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> ve-'e-Chad me one י֔וֹם <WH3117> Yom, days וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold מִֽיכָאֵ֗ל <WH4317> mi-cha-'El, but lo Michael אַחַ֛ד <WH259> 'a-Chad one הַשָּׂרִ֥ים <WH8269> has-sa-Rim princes הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> ha-ri-sho-Nim of the chief בָּ֣א <WH935> ba came לְעָזְרֵ֑נִי <WH5826> le-'a-ze-Re-ni; to help וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I נוֹתַ֣רְתִּי <WH3498> no-Tar-ti me and I remained שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel there with מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> mal-Chei the kings פָרָֽס׃ <WH6539> fa-Ras. of Persia

וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> u-Va-ti Now I am come לַהֲבִ֣ינְךָ֔ <WH995> la-ha-Vi-ne-cha, to make thee understand אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of what יִקְרָ֥ה <WH7136> yik-Rah what shall befall לְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> le-'am-me-Cha thy people בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> be-'a-cha-Rit in the latter הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim; days כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ע֥וֹד <WH5750> od yet חָז֖וֹן <WH2377> cha-Zon for yet the vision לַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> lai-ya-Mim. [is] for [many] days

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <WH1696> u-ve-dab-be-Ro And when he had spoken עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> 'im-Mi, with כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> kad-de-va-Rim such words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; to these נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti unto me I set פָנַ֛י <WH6440> fa-Nai my face אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah toward the ground וְנֶאֱלָֽמְתִּי׃ <WH481> ve-ne-'e-La-me-ti. and I became dumb

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh, and behold כִּדְמוּת֙ <WH1823> kid-Mut And behold [one] like the similitude בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of men נֹגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> no-Ge-a' touched עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׂפָתָ֑י <WH8193> se-fa-Tai; my lips וָאֶפְתַּח־ <WH6605> va-'ef-tach- then I opened פִּ֗י <WH6310> Pi, my mouth וָאֲדַבְּרָה֙ <WH1696> va-'a-dab-be-Rah and spake וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <WH559> va-'o-me-Rah and said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to him הָעֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> ha-'o-Med unto him that stood לְנֶגְדִּ֔י <WH5048> le-neg-Di, before אֲדֹנִ֗י <WH113> 'a-do-Ni, before me O my lord בַּמַּרְאָה֙ <WH4759> bam-mar-'Ah by the vision נֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <WH2015> ne-hef-Chu are turned צִירַי֙ <WH6735> tzi-Rai my sorrows עָלַ֔י <WH5921> 'a-Lai, and וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <WH6113> 'a-Tzar-ti upon me and I have retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> Ko-ach. no strength

וְהֵ֣יךְ <WH1963> ve-Heich For how יוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> yu-Chal, can עֶ֤בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved the servant אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni of this my lord זֶ֔ה <WH2088> Zeh, such לְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber talk עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֲדֹ֣נִי <WH113> 'a-Do-ni of my lord זֶ֑ה <WH2088> Zeh; such וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I מֵעַ֙תָּה֙ <WH6258> me-'At-tah now לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no יַעֲמָד־ <WH5975> ya-'a-mod- there remained בִּ֣י bi כֹ֔חַ <WH3581> Cho-ach, no strength וּנְשָׁמָ֖ה <WH5397> u-ne-sha-Mah in me neither is there breath לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor נִשְׁאֲרָה־ <WH7604> nish-'a-rah- left בִֽי׃ <WH99999> Vi.
